x+=b+y[i].major+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+u2;

	};result +=x;
	};
f("male","[ç”·]");f("female","[å¥³]");f("epub","[å‡ºç‰ˆ]");
ff("male","[ç”·]");ff("female","[å¥³]");ff("press","[å‡ºç‰ˆ]");

<js>
str1=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/å°è¯´/doulist");
str2=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/æ–‡å­¦/doulist");
str3=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/å†å²/doulist");

reg2=/[^>]+(?=<\/h3>)/gi;

}
result=x;
</js>
